Package mySQL

Class GeneralQuery

java.lang.Object
mySQL.GeneralQuery
public class GeneralQuery extends Object
This class is designed to handle general queries to the server.

    • getAllFromTable

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList getAllFromTable(String table) throws SQLException
      Method responsible for getting all items from a table The user supplies the table name, the method handles the SQL statement. Then it attempts the query and if successful goes through a switch to generate the appropriate list, i.e. a list of customers or users or countries, etc. otherwise the error is logged.
      Throws:
      SQLException
